statements: SELECT * FROM FaceRecognitionMetrics WHERE detected_faces > 5
SELECT image_url, timestamp FROM FaceRecognitionMetrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT id, accuracy FROM FaceRecognitionMetrics WHERE correct_recognition = 1
SELECT * FROM FaceRecognitionMetrics WHERE detected_faces = 2 AND accuracy > 0.8
SELECT id, image_url, correct_recognition FROM FaceRecognitionMetrics ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT id, image_url, timestamp, detected_faces, correct_recognition, accuracy FROM FaceRecognitionMetrics;
SELECT image_url, id, accuracy, correct_recognition, detected_faces, timestamp FROM FaceRecognitionMetrics
SELECT id, image_url, timestamp, accuracy FROM FaceRecognitionMetrics WHERE detected_faces > 0 AND correct_recognition > 0;
SELECT * FROM FaceRecognitionMetrics WHERE accuracy >= 0.9 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT id, image_url, timestamp, detected_faces, CONCAT(detected_faces, ' faces detected') AS face_details FROM FaceRecognitionMetrics;
SELECT * FROM FaceRecognitionMetrics;
SELECT timestamp, recognized_faces FROM FaceRecognitionMetrics WHERE recognized_faces > 10 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT recognized_face_id, image_path FROM FaceRecognitionLogs WHERE recognized_face_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, image_path FROM FaceRecognitionLogs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-09-01' AND '2022-09-30';
SELECT metric_id, recognized_faces FROM FaceRecognitionMetrics WHERE recognized_faces < 5 ORDER BY metric_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM FaceRecognitionMetrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT metric_id, recognized_faces FROM FaceRecognitionMetrics WHERE unrecognized_faces > 0
SELECT timestamp, recognized_faces FROM FaceRecognitionMetrics WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT recognized_faces, unrecognized_faces FROM FaceRecognitionMetrics WHERE recognized_faces > unrecognized_faces
SELECT * FROM FaceRecognitionLogs JOIN FaceRecognitionMetrics ON FaceRecognitionLogs.recognized_face_id = FaceRecognitionMetrics.metric_id
SELECT * FROM FaceRecognitionMetrics;
SELECT image_id, process_time FROM FaceRecognitionLogs ORDER BY process_time DESC;
SELECT log_id, recognition_result FROM FaceRecognitionLogs WHERE recognition_result='Pass';
SELECT image_id, recognition_accuracy FROM FaceRecognitionMetrics WHERE recognition_accuracy > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM FaceRecognitionSettings ORDER BY setting_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM FaceRecognitionMetrics WHERE recognition_accuracy > 0.9 ORDER BY process_time DESC;
SELECT image_id, recognition_accuracy FROM FaceRecognitionMetrics WHERE process_time > '2022-01-01' AND recognition_accuracy < 0.8;
SELECT log_id, image_id, process_time FROM FaceRecognitionLogs JOIN FaceRecognitionMetrics ON FaceRecognitionLogs.image_id = FaceRecognitionMetrics.image_id;
SELECT image_id, recognition_accuracy FROM FaceRecognitionMetrics WHERE recognition_accuracy BETWEEN 0.7 AND 0.9 ORDER BY process_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT setting_id, detection_threshold, recognition_threshold FROM FaceRecognitionSettings WHERE detection_threshold < 0.5 OR recognition_threshold > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM FacialRecognitionSystemMetrics ORDER BY date_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT image_name, accuracy FROM FacialRecognitionSystemMetrics WHERE accuracy >= 0.8;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM EmployeeInformation ORDER BY department, employee_name;
SELECT system_id, accuracy, detection_time FROM PerformanceHistory WHERE accuracy < 0.5 ORDER BY detection_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM SystemConfiguration WHERE active = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM FacialRecognitionSystemMetrics ORDER BY accuracy DESC, detection_time ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT image_name FROM FacialRecognitionSystemMetrics WHERE accuracy > 0.8 AND detection_time < 0.5;
SELECT e.employee_name, e.department, p.date FROM EmployeeInformation e INNER JOIN PerformanceHistory p ON e.employee_id = p.system_id WHERE p.accuracy > 0.9;
SELECT s.system_name, s.algorithm, s.threshold FROM SystemConfiguration s WHERE s.active = TRUE;
SELECT p.date, e.employee_name FROM PerformanceHistory p INNER JOIN EmployeeInformation e ON p.system_id = e.employee_id WHERE p.accuracy > 0.85;
SELECT * FROM Facial_Recognition_Performance_Metrics;
SELECT name, accuracy FROM Facial_Recognition_Performance_Metrics WHERE id = 1;
SELECT image_name, timestamp FROM Image_Data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT username, age, gender FROM User_Records WHERE age > 30;
SELECT operation, message FROM Performance_Logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-02-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM Facial_Recognition_Performance_Metrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT name, accuracy, precision FROM Facial_Recognition_Performance_Metrics WHERE accuracy > 0.8 AND precision > 0.8;
SELECT username, age, gender FROM User_Records WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT log_id, timestamp, operation, message FROM Performance_Logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT health_id, cpu_usage, memory_usage FROM System_Health ORDER BY health_id;
